Vocab 2

Tlua _______ 'nnuigtug.

Say _______ in Native.

Getu' 'gji'tu ta'n tel-tluen _______ .

I want to know how you say _______.

Ge' apoqonmui.

Please help me.

Ge' apoqonmui teluei.

Please help me say it.

Tami e'w't's na glusuaqan?

Where would you use that word?

Tali-e'w'mugg na glusuaqan?

How would I use that word?
